tidbits.title: Himalayan Beauty
tidbits.description: Nepal is known for its stunning Himalayan landscapes, including Mount Everest, and offers trekking adventures and breathtaking views.

tidbits.title: Cultural Diversity
tidbits.description: The country is culturally diverse, with Hindu and Buddhist traditions, ancient temples, and a rich tapestry of ethnic groups and languages.

tidbits.title: Spirituality and Hospitality
tidbits.description: Nepal's spirituality is evident in religious practices and festivals, and the warmth and hospitality of its people make visitors feel welcome.
